general.title: General Settings
general.autoUpdateDescription: This will automatically update the app when new versions are available.
general.releaseChannelStableDescription: Stable is recommended for most users.
general.releaseChannelBetaDescription: Beta receives more frequent updates but may have more bugs.
general.runtimeModeDescription: Choose whether to run apps directly on the local machine or in Docker containers
general.dockerWarning: Docker mode is experimental and requires Docker Desktop to be installed and running
general.usingStableChannelDescription: You'll stay on your current version until a newer stable release is available, or you can manually downgrade now.
general.usingBetaChannelDescription: You will need to restart CodeDuet for your settings to take effect.
general.autoUpdateSettingsChangedDescription: You will need to restart CodeDuet for your settings to take effect.

workflow.title: Workflow Settings
workflow.autoApproveDescription: This will automatically approve code changes and run them.
workflow.autoFixProblemsDescription: This will automatically fix TypeScript errors.
workflow.responseEndNotificationDescription: Show native notifications when assistant finishes replying.

ai.title: AI Settings
ai.maxChatTurns: Maximum number of chat turns used in context
ai.maxChatTurnsDescription: Balanced context size for most conversations.

telemetry.title: Telemetry
telemetry.description: This records anonymous usage data to improve the product.

experiments.title: Experiments
experiments.enableNativeGitDescription: Native Git offers faster performance but requires installing Git.
experiments.enableConfettiDescription: Show confetti animations when completing setup tasks.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.resetEverythingDescription: This will delete all your apps, chats, and settings. This action cannot be undone.

apps.title: Your Apps
apps.importAppDescription: Select an existing app folder to import into CodeDuet.
apps.importAppExperimentalNote: App import is an experimental feature. If you encounter any issues, please report them using the Help button.
apps.appNameExists: An app with this name already exists. Please choose a different name:
apps.bothCommandsRequired: Both commands are required when customizing.
apps.noAiRulesFound: No AI_RULES.md found. CodeDuet will automatically generate one after importing.
apps.aiRulesTooltip: AI_RULES.md lets CodeDuet know which tech stack to use for editing the app
apps.appImportedWithAiRules: App imported successfully. CodeDuet will automatically generate an AI_RULES.md now.
apps.buildingDescription: We're setting up your app with AI magic. This might take a moment...

templates.title: Pick your default template
templates.subtitle: Choose a starting point for your new project.

reactTemplate.title: React.js Template
reactTemplate.description: Uses React.js, Vite, Shadcn, Tailwind and TypeScript.

nextTemplate.title: Next.js Template
nextTemplate.description: Uses Next.js, React.js, Shadcn, Tailwind and TypeScript.
